programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A money launderer (Stellan Skarsgard) for Russian gangsters asks a couple vacationing in Marrakech, Morocco, to deliver incriminating evidence to an MI6 agent (Damian Lewis).

programme.title: The Portable Door, (2023, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: The Living Daylights, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond (Timothy Dalton) takes a Czech cellist (Maryam d'Abo) to her boyfriend, a KGB defector (Jeroen Krabb) doing business in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Dr. No, (1962, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: Octopussy, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) links a fake Faberge egg to smugglers (Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan) in league with a mad Soviet general.

programme.title: From Russia With Love, (1963, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 arrives in Istanbul, bringing with him a Russian beauty who is an unwitting pawn in SPECTRE's plot to kill him.

programme.title: Live and Let Die, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) charms a tarot reader (Jane Seymour) in Jamaica on the voodoo/heroin trail of Mr. Big (Yaphet Kotto).

programme.title: GoldenEye, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A secret weapon's theft sends Agent 007 to Russia, where a pretty computer programmer helps him track an ex-cohort believed dead.

programme.title: Casino Royale, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After receiving a license to kill, British agent James Bond (Daniel Craig) enters a high-stakes poker game with Le Chiffre (Mads Mikkelsen), a man who finances terrorist groups.

programme.title: Die Another Day, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: James Bond (Pierce Brosnan) teams with a beautiful agent (Halle Berry) to battle a terrorist and a businessman (Toby Stephens) bent on world domination.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: LaRoy, Texas, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mistaken for a low-rent hit man, Ray decides to play the part of a hired gun. However, when the supposedly simple plan begins to unravel, he recruits a private investigator to help him escape from the actual killer and make it out alive.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London, (2004, Children)
programme.desc: A 16-year-old CIA agent (Frankie Muniz) poses as a clarinet prodigy while trying to recover stolen mind-control software.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging irresponsible misfit (Paul Newman) falls in love with an unhappily married younger woman (Melanie Griffith).

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV host's (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Daredevil operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) springs into action when four dangerous criminals steal Pandora's Box, a device that controls every military satellite in the world.

programme.title: Casino Royale, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After receiving a license to kill, British agent James Bond (Daniel Craig) enters a high-stakes poker game with Le Chiffre (Mads Mikkelsen), a man who finances terrorist groups.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra, they are also forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: The Parallax View, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A reporter's investigation into a political assassination reveals a nationwide network of trained killers.

programme.title: Suspect Zero, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: With help from his former partner (Carrie-Anne Moss), an FBI agent (Aaron Eckhart) searches for a man (Ben Kingsley) who is hunting and murdering serial killers.

programme.title: Intersection, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An architect (Richard Gere) on the brink of a car accident recalls troubles with his wife (Sharon Stone) and his mistress (Lolita Davidovich) in Vancouver, British Columbia.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A '50s-era housewife (Julianne Moore) uses her wit and winnings from commercial jingle contests to help support her large family.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: The Deep House, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: While diving in a remote French lake, two YouTubers who specialize in underwater exploration videos discover a house submerged in deep waters. Their dive turns into a nightmare when they discover the house was the scene of atrocious crimes.

programme.title: The Passenger, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content to fade into the background, but when one of his co-workers goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he must face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Mimic, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: Married scientists (Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam) battle killer cockroaches that develop the ability to assume human form.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: A black bird resurrects a rock musician (Brandon Lee) who then avenges his own murder and his fiancee's.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy, on the move again, ends up in Chihuahua, Mexico, with a new Mexican friend called Segura; together they enjoy several risky escapades -- but in the end, Billy risks losing his life.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy bumps into a new character called Pat Garrett, who is riding with Jesse and the 7 Rivers Gang; Billy joins them - but law makers are already closing in; they plan to flee to Lincoln County - but not before Billy fulfils one last promise.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Rings, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman (Matilda Lutz) makes a horrifying discovery after her boyfriend (Alex Roe) investigates a story about a mysterious video that kills people seven days after they watch it.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: An Old West sharpshooter (Tom Selleck) goes to Australia, where his new boss (Alan Rickman) expects him to kill Aboriginal Australians.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: A man with no name (Clint Eastwood) and a man with a mission (Lee Van Cleef) hunt a Mexican bandit (Gian Maria Volonte) for different reasons.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: A former Marine (Thomas Ian Griffith) returns to Vietnam to rescue a comrade (Chris Mulkey) and retrieve nuclear triggers.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: Unhuman, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Seven misfit students must band together against a growing gang of unhuman savages. Their trust in each other gets tested to the limit in a brutal, horrifying fight to survive as they take down the murderous zombie creatures.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Undercover Brother, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: A low-rent private detective poses as a preppy nerd in order to foil a plot by conspirators.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hip detective (Eddie Murphy) from Detroit tracks a crime ring to a Los Angeles fun park called WonderWorld.

programme.title: 48 HRS., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A rumpled detective gets a slick convict released into his custody for two days to help him find a murderer in San Francisco.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: An old gunfighter (John Wayne), a drifter (James Caan) and a deputy sober up a sheriff (Robert Mitchum) to track down killers.

programme.title: Three Wishes, (1995, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A frustrated family man recalls an encounter he (Joseph Mazzello), his widowed mom (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio) and his family had with a mysterious vagrant (Patrick Swayze) in 1955 suburbia.

programme.title: How It Ends, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: A woman scores an invite to one last wild party before the world ends. However, making it there won't be easy after her car is stolen and the clock is ticking on her plan to tie up loose ends with friends and family.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Three private detectives try to rescue a kidnapped computer pro whose voice-ID software would threaten global security.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Three private detectives (Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu) work under cover to retrieve two rings that contain cryptic information.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: A pampered actor and his co-stars must become actual soldiers when the war movie they are filming in Southeast Asia turns into the real thing.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy City's police force.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: Training Day, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie police officer meets a corrupt Los Angeles narcotics detective who wants to include him in his schemes.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-cop doing prison time chases a virtual-reality killer from the program onto the Los Angeles streets.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri, (1954, War)
programme.desc: Recalled to duty, a lawyer (William Holden) leaves his wife (Grace Kelly) and goes to Korea to bomb bridges for an admiral (Fredric March).

programme.title: To Catch a Thief, (1955, Thriller)
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar (Cary Grant) sees fireworks with an American heiress (Grace Kelly) on the Riviera.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A corporate dictator (John Houseman) tries to oust the star player (James Caan) of a brutal 21st-century spectator sport.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-cop doing prison time chases a virtual-reality killer from the program onto the Los Angeles streets.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: Training Day, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie police officer meets a corrupt Los Angeles narcotics detective who wants to include him in his schemes.

programme.title: School Ties, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A scholarship student (Brendan Fraser) hides his Jewish heritage to fit in at an Eastern prep school in the mid-1950s.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland team's new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: American servicemen are still being held captive in Vietnam and it's up to one man to bring them home in this blistering, fast-paced action/adventure starring martial arts superstar Chuck Norris.

programme.title: Missing In Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris returns as James Braddock in this action-packed prequel to the original hit film. As war rages in Vietnam, Braddock and his men are captured and imprisoned. With fists and sheer courage, he must become an army of one to save his men.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing In Action III, (1988, Action)

programme.title: Code of Silence, (1985, Action)

programme.title: Invasion U.S.A., (1985, Action)

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap, (1984, Comedy)

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)

programme.title: The Green Hornet, (2011, Action)

programme.title: The Green Hornet, (2011, Action)

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Drama)

programme.title: Country Strong, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: Hyena Road, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Three men, three different paths, caught in conflict but brought together to save lives: a highly skilled sniper who cant think of his targets as human, an intelligence officer who has never killed while on duty.

programme.desc: When safe cracker Nick decides it's time to settle down with his girlfriend Diane and stick to his legitimate business, running a jazz nightclub, his friend and partner Max has other plans.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Hired to steal a rare painting, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: For three showgirls it was the dream of a lifetime, a four week cabaret engagement in Alice Springs. The problem is simply getting there intact, along with their bus Priscilla. It's not easy being a drag queen in the outback!

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: A comedy-fantasy about a Depression-era movie fan/waitress whose day-to-day existence is enlivened when her latest idol walks right off the screen and into her life!

programme.title: Roxanne, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: Comic genius Steve Martin delivers an incredible performance as an engaging small town fire chief who has only one tiny flaw - no, make that one HUGE flaw - his astonishingly long nose.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert De Niro and Robin Williams star in a story of the consequences of a maverick doctor's medical miracle. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Birdcage, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Robin Williams, Gene Hackman, Nathan Lane and Dianne Wiest lead the laughs in this wild Comedy that insists you don't have to be a woman to be a mother.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert De Niro and Robin Williams star in a story of the consequences of a maverick doctor's medical miracle. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Birdcage, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Robin Williams, Gene Hackman, Nathan Lane and Dianne Wiest lead the laughs in this wild Comedy that insists you don't have to be a woman to be a mother.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Force 10 From Navarone, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: A group of allied commandos on a mission against the 3rd Reich has orders to blow a giant dam in order to crush a strategic bridge held by the Nazis.

programme.title: The Boys From Brazil, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: Walking Tall, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Electra Glide In Blue, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: In this visually stunning cult classic, when good-hearted motorcycle cop John Wintergreen (Robert Blake) is promoted to detective, he heads out on his bike, the Electra Glide, and makes a discovery that could cost him his life!

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido's subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thinking of Otama! Luffys Furious Strike!

programme.title: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!

programme.title: Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and all the others are trying to infiltrate Kaido's castle from all sides. Meanwhile, Big Mom's children are climbing up the waterfall towards Onigashima, but this time, Marco the Phoenix appears from nowhere and stands in their way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: The furious Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp, but they bravely fight back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!

programme.title: Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, members of the Tobi Roppo from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Hearing that he aims to become the King of the Pirates, the brother and sister duo become infuriated and turn themselves into massive beasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaidos Son!

programme.title: Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido's son Yamato's motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy's punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!

programme.title: The Akazaya members who were on board Law's Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn't expect. Kaido's son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what's behind his mask!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desire to be Oden! Yamatos Dream!

programme.title: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamatos Freedom!

programme.title: Kaido's plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!

programme.title: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffys All-Out War Begins!

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon/
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!

programme.title: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ill Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Odens Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Wont Forgive Him! Choppers Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasakis Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Choppers Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamatos Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marcos Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Drama)

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prisonin the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: Breakdown - Implacvel Perseguio
programme.desc: Um homem procura por sua esposa desaparecida depois que seu carro quebra no meio do deserto.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: Jogo Assassino
programme.desc: A polcia prende um psicopata que est ligado a vrios sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura ser apenas o incio de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vtimas.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Soldado Universal 3: Regenerao
programme.desc: Um soldado ressuscitado e geneticamente modificado enfrenta seus inimigos, contratados por terroristas nucleares.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Sobreviva a noite
programme.desc: Um intenso filme de ao, que traz Dolph Lundgren como um agente da Interpol protegendo sua esposa e filha de um criminoso implacvel e seus mercenrios em um vilarejo italiano.

programme.title: Caada ao Presidente
programme.desc: Aps o avio em que estava ter sido abatido por terroristas, o presidente dos Estados Unidos est ferido e perdido no meio de uma zona rural finlandesa. E sua vida agora est nas mos de Oskari um tmido jovem de treze anos de idade.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra
programme.desc: Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Fenmenos Paranormais 2
programme.desc: Um ano depois de uma equipe de filmagem ter passado uma noite fatal no Hospital Psiquitrico de Collingwood, uma nova equipe est entrando nos corredores em busca da verdade. Isto , se algum for deixado vivo para contar a histria.

programme.title: Voo 7500
programme.desc: Um voo sai dos Estados Unidos para o Japo, durante as dez horas de voo os passageiros pensam em como se distrair ... at perceberem uma presena estranha e sobrenatural dentro do avio.

programme.title: Pnico nas Alturas
programme.desc: Cinco jovens, que querem celebrar o Ano Novo no topo de uma montanha, ficam presos em um telefrico quando uma terrvel tempestade tem incio. O que era para ser uma festa de aventura, logo se torna uma luta pela sobrevivncia.

programme.title: Sombra da Morte
programme.desc: Christy volta para casa aps a morte de sua irm Vanessa, e assombrada por profticas vises de violncia e assassinato, que comeam a se tornar realidade.

programme.title: A Casa Silenciosa
programme.desc: Uma jovem fica presa dentro do refgio beira do lago de sua famlia e se torna incapaz de entrar em contato com o mundo exterior enquanto foras sobrenaturais assombram a casa com energias e consequncias misteriosas.

programme.title: Jessabelle: O Passado Nunca Morre
programme.desc: Uma jovem forada a voltar para a casa de seu pai, na Louisiana, quando um acidente de trnsito a deixa incapacitada, sem poder usar as pernas.

programme.title: Fenmenos Paranormais 2
programme.desc: Um ano depois de uma equipe de filmagem ter passado uma noite fatal no Hospital Psiquitrico de Collingwood, uma nova equipe est entrando nos corredores em busca da verdade. Isto , se algum for deixado vivo para contar a histria.

programme.title: Breakdown - Implacvel Perseguio
programme.desc: Um homem procura por sua esposa desaparecida depois que seu carro quebra no meio do deserto.

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito
programme.desc: Sem dinheiro, o estudante Martin vira vigia noturno no necrotrio da cidade, mas o tranquilo trabalho se torna aterrorizante quando um assassino em srie passa a deixar pistas que apontam para ele.

programme.title: O Corvo III: A Salvao
programme.desc: Alex Corvis um jovem injustamente condenado cadeira eltrica pelo brutal assassinato de Lauren, sua namorada. Pelo poder mgico do corvo, Corvis retorna do mundo dos mortos para vingar a morte de Lauren e limpar seu nome.

programme.title: Ameaa Explosiva
programme.desc: Depois de uma ameaa de bomba, dois especialistas do FBI mergulham em um jogo mortal de gato e rato com um criminoso, correndo desesperadamente contra o tempo para descobrir o verdadeiro objetivo do homem-bomba, enquanto lutam para salvar sua cidade.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: O Advogado dos 5 Crimes
programme.desc: Um advogado expulso da Ordem leva o crdito pelo livro de um amigo falecido, que se torna um grande sucesso, mas a situao se inverte mais cedo do que ele suspeitava.

programme.title: A Fronteira
programme.desc: Inspirado em fatos reais sobre uma reprter americana de Phoenix (Sharon Stone) procura de seu irmo desaparecido, e que estar envolvida na violncia que o trfico de pessoas causa na fronteira entre os Estados Unidos e o Mxico

programme.title: Mega Shark vs. Mecha Shark
programme.desc: Quando um novo Mega Shark ameaa a humanidade, o governo desencadeia o secreto Mecha Shark para derrotar o monstro em uma batalha campal que ameaa o planeta.

programme.title: Tubaro da Terra
programme.desc: Um grupo cientfico que tenta modificar geneticamente um tubaro cria uma mquina de matar destrutiva, que nem eles conseguem controlar.

programme.title: Piranha 2
programme.desc: No passado, uma feio geolgica nas profundezas da gua despertou uma pira que estava extinta h milhes de anos. Depois de atacar o lago em uma cidade tranquila, os terrveis animais invadem um parque aqutico no meio da temporada de vero.

programme.title: Megalodon
programme.desc: Uma embarcao militar em busca de um submersvel no identificado encontra-se cara a cara com um tubaro gigante, forado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da besta monstruosa.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Projeto Legio
programme.desc: Um ex-militar enfrenta um cenrio apocalptico quando fica preso em seu apartamento e precisa encontrar uma maneira de sobreviver ameaa de criaturas que aterrorizam a cidade e espreitam sua porta.

programme.title: Inferno na Montanha
programme.desc: Um pai e um filho tentam salvar os habitantes de uma pequena cidade de um desastre natural e do colapso de um tnel recm-construdo.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: Luta pela liberdade
programme.desc: Liam, um homem de quem tudo o que tinha sido tirado da priso, tenta reconstruir sua vida, apaixonando-se por quem no deveria e seguindo o estranho modo de vida de uma famlia violenta.

programme.title: Jogada de Risco
